title: Did Twitter Slap a Warning Label on a Trump Tweet for ‘Glorifying Violence’?
subtitle: The U.S. president's tweets about May 2020 protests of police in Minneapolis generated heated reactions.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Twitter added a warning label to and hid U.S. President Donald Trump's tweet about the Minneapolis protests against police brutality, saying it violated the platform's rules against "glorifying violence."
